name: The Bivium Group
overview:
The Bivium Group specializes in software engineers/software engineering - R&D, development and SQA recruiting - emphasis (70%) on Private/VC-backed startups as well as major (30%) Public company recruiting in the greater Boston, MA market.

Both contingency and retained search models for recruiters.

The most important aspect of what we do is building long-term relationships that focus on RESULTS. We match our clients’ workload with weekends, late night and a “do what it takes” attitude to reach our shared goals.

We specialize in recruiting for software engineers - from recent computer science grads to VPE/CTO levels. All flavors of technical backgrounds C/C++, Java, J2EE (Spring/Hibernate, JSP, etc) VC++, C#, .NET, web developers, Ruby, RoR, Web 2.0, Flex/Flash, ActionScript, Dojo, AJAX, ext-JS, LAMP, PHP, Python, Perl - from Associate Software Engineers to Principal/Lead Software Engineers,Team Lead Software Engineers, Software Architects to Software Managers, Engineering Directors, VP Engineering, CTO

===

The Bivium Group is comprised of some of the most talented and successful individuals in the recruiting industry. Our goal is to provide retained level service in a contingency-based model. We strive to offer the best recruiting experience available today. Our veteran team has founded and worked for both emerging technology companies as well as some of the leading national and regional recruiting firms in the United States.

Specialties Scott Dunlop, Founder, Software Engineering, who has been in the technology arena for over 20 yrs. He has worked within several startups including positions such as VP Operations, GM and Founder at three tech based startups - including his own consulting firm from the late 80s and into the 90’s. Scott is a life-long entrepreneur and has been quoted in books such as “The Venture Cafe: Secrets, Strategies, and Stories from America’s High-Tech Entrepreneurs”.
